titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the The University of Michigan Law School [video recording]

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: The University of Michigan Law School [video recording]

archdesc.scopecontent: Video presentation designed to introduce the law school to prospective students. The video includes classroom scenes and views of the law school facilities, and photographic images of former faculty.
